attributes.action: Use open source software in preference to closed source software in the public sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Open source software (such as Linux, BSD UNIX, OpenOffice, FireFox, etc) should used in the public sector whenever possible rather than close proprietry soluctions (such as Microsoft Windows, Office, Internet Explorer).

Using Open source software with open standards will stimulate UK IT jobs and will cost less and reduce the UK IT spend. 

Open source software should be used more in education to encourage UK business to use alternative open IT solutions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
